text: Independents gained a majority of the seats, giving them control of the council Elections to the Skye and Lochalsh District Council took place in May 1988, alongside elections to the councils of Scotland's various other districts. The number of seats and the total vote share won by each party is listed below. Voter turnout was 48.6%. ==Notes and References== Category:1988 Scottish local elections
title: 1988 Skye and Lochalsh District Council election
